dissolution_mechanism.plain_language: When humanity (as a whole) has genuinely become wise enough that coercive scaffolding is no longer ethically justifiable, the entire system — cubes, collider, MINDSPACE levers, Narrow Gate protocol, all of it — will automatically and irreversibly shut itself down.
dissolution_mechanism.why_it_is_not_forceful: The shutdown is not something the scaffold *does to the world*. It is something the scaffold *stops doing to itself*. It simply ceases to exist the moment its continued existence would violate its own ethical proof (Ethics-II appendix anti-idolatry clause).
what_happens_in_practice: All on-chain enforcement contracts expire and return escrows
All predictive/prescriptive cube nodes go offline and delete their weights
All commitment ledgers become read-only historical artifacts
The collider object zeroises its own keys
No new defaults, norms, or priming sequences are pushed ever again
what_does_NOT_happen: No one is coerced to do anything
No knowledge is deleted from human minds or open repositories
dissolution_mechanism.best_analogy: Training wheels that detect when the child is balanced and then quietly fall off the bicycle of their own accord. The rider never notices they are gone — because they no longer need them.

terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-1_anti_idolatry: Under no circumstances may any person, group, or future AI attempt to resurrect, fork, or re-implement the scaffold after certified dissolution. Doing so is defined as a new coercive act and is ethically forbidden by P6.4.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-2_no_mourning: Public celebration, mourning, monuments, or religious ritualisation of the dissolution event is prohibited. The correct response is silence and continuation of ordinary life.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-3_no_successor: There is no authorised successor system. Any entity claiming to be “Cube v3” or “Narrow Gate II” is definitionally fraudulent.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-4_transparency_guarantee: The full source code, weights, and final telemetry of the scaffold will be published under irrevocable permissive licence the instant dissolution triggers. Nothing is hidden, nothing is preserved as a weapon.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-5_final_audit: Dissolution can only be certified by a decentralised quorum of ≥10⁶ independent human+machine auditors. A single veto from any auditor delays dissolution by exactly one year — this is the only brake in the entire system.

dissolution_mechanism.final_scholium: When the training wheels fall off, the only honourable sound is the wind.
